field.name: onrecordaddsendemailto
field.label: On Record Add Send Email to
field.description:
The email with the data filled in the form will be sent to this email. More than one email is ok. Separate them with the comma.
Also you may use a value of the field of the table to send an email to. To have your own Email Subject please type : after email and then the subject. Example 1: [email] Example 2: test@yahoo.com,test@gmail.com,[email] Example 3: [email]:Thank you for participation
